assetProfile.address2: Suite No. 303 and 308, 3rd Floor Plot No. 5, Commercial Centre Jasola
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: MBL Infrastructures Limited provides integrated engineering, procurement, and construction services for civil construction and infrastructure sector projects in India. The company constructs, operates, and maintains highways; executes highway and BOT; railways/metro and other infrastructure; and housing, urban, and industrial infrastructure projects. The company was formerly known as Maheshwari Brothers Limited and changed its name to MBL Infrastructures Limited in July 2006. MBL Infrastructures Limited was incorporated in 1995 and is based in New Delhi, India.
